definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: I'm in Acapulco, and it's pretty nice.
sentences.chinese: 我到達阿卡普爾科了，這裏真不錯。

sentences.english: Acapulco Museum of History is the location of the ancient fortress of San Diego.
sentences.chinese: 阿卡普爾科歷史博物館的所在地是古老的聖迪戈要塞。

sentences.english: There's something for guests of every interest in the conveniently located Las Brisas Acapulco.
sentences.chinese: 這是在位於阿卡普爾科的每一個客人的東西感興趣。
